Package org.eclipse.eef.ide.ui.api.widgets

Interface EEFStyleHelper.IEEFTextStyleCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EEFCheckboxStyleCallback, EEFStyledTextStyleCallback
    Enclosing class:
    EEFStyleHelper

    public static interface EEFStyleHelper.IEEFTextStyleCallback
    This class will be called to update the style of the text.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void applyBackgroundColor​(EEFColor color)
      Applies the given background color to the widget.
      void applyFont​(EEFFont font)
      Applies the given font to the widget.
      void applyFontStyle​(boolean strikeout, boolean underline)
      Applies the strikeout and/or underline styles.
      void applyForegroundColor​(EEFColor color)
      Applies the given foreground color to the widget.

    • Method Detail

      • applyFont

        void applyFont​(EEFFont font)
        Applies the given font to the widget.
        Parameters:
        font - The font

      • applyFontStyle

        void applyFontStyle​(boolean strikeout,
                    boolean underline)
        Applies the strikeout and/or underline styles.
        Parameters:
        strikeout - true if the widget should be striked out, false otherwise
        underline - true if the widget should be underlined, false otherwise

      • applyForegroundColor

        void applyForegroundColor​(EEFColor color)
        Applies the given foreground color to the widget.
        Parameters:
        color - The foreground color

      • applyBackgroundColor

        void applyBackgroundColor​(EEFColor color)
        Applies the given background color to the widget.
        Parameters:
        color - The background color
